Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Vase for cosmetics
Description: Elongated pear-shaped vase for cosmetics with a small flat base. The neck is well defined, the mouth is unrestricted, the lip is slightly protruding. Traces of a black material are still visible on the inside. This vessel could have been used as a container for perfumed oils.
